description:
The U.S. military heads in, but Sato is one step ahead of them. Kei returns to the team. Tosaki is approached by Ajin Okuyama, who has a proposition.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: But That Makes It Interesting, So Whatever
Demo Maa, Omoshirosou Dakara Ii kedo ne
Mais ça rend les choses intéressantes
でもまあ, 面白そうだからいいけどね
그래도 뭐 재미있을 것 같아서 좋네
